title: Ticket #5483: Check stack status while waiting for ASGs (and instances).
description: This should only happen during development, but we should check the status of the stack when waiting for its ASGs to be created. If the status isn't "in progress" of some sort or another, we should probably let the user know. Likewise, when waiting for instances and/or startds.
remarks:
2016-Aug-25 11:29:21 by tlmiller:
Abandoning as specific to the prototype.
creator: tlmiller
